ovdesc.p: Allows to define the ISO External Codes. The possible external codes allowed are Domain code, Family and Subfamily codes. It will be extended to allow other External codes in the future.

desc.p: Id holds the ISO External codes, it is used to hold the Transaction Code for Xml Statement.
Multi-lingual Field which holds the standard description of the Bank transaction domain code.
Defines the type of External code.
The possible External codes that can be defined are related to the Bank Transaction code: Domain, Family and Subfamily codes.
